bill_title: require electrical utilities to file certain information with the Public Utilities Commission.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require electrical utilities to file certain information with the Public Utilities Commission. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. For the purposes of this Act, the term, small power production facility, means a facility that uses wind to produce electric power and has a power production capacity of no greater than twenty megawatts. Section 2. For the purposes of this Act, the term, avoided costs, means the incremental costs to an electric utility, as defined in § 49-34A-1, of electric energy or capacity or both which, but for the purchase from a small power production facility, the utility would generate itself or purchase from another source. Section 3. Each electric utility shall file with the Public Utilities Commission the avoided cost level of the electric utility. Section 4. Any small power production facility may petition the Public Utilities Commission to enforce the requirements of this Act.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
